Class PushMessage

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class PushMessage
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a Push Message.

    1.0

      • getType

        public java.lang.String getType()
        Get type of message. Us this to match against one of the PushNotifier.TYPE_* constants.
        Returns:
        String

      • getContent

        public java.lang.String getContent()
        Get content of message. In case of type MESSAGE or HIDDENURL, this is the message. In case of type URL, this is the URL.
        Returns:
        String

      • getHiddenURL
